attributes.action: Revoke the BBC's Royal Charter and cancel the unfair TV tax
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC was established when there was no
effective media choice. The licence fee is
abhorrent in today's media world.
attributes.background:
The BBC has a Charter obligation to be
independent in fulfilment of its mission. It has
repeatedly shown itself incapable of providing impartial reportage on major political issues.
